subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] FM Sweep & Optical Microphone
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
So that's just the same set up, putting a light in front of the solar panel, 
or photo transistor, and recording the signal from the panel? Maybe while 
scanning the radio out into the room?

Frank
